fields.value: Social Security Longitudinal Earnings Public Use File, 1937-1975

dsDescriptionValue.value:
This study contains longitudinal data developed and updated for use with CURRENT POPULATION SURVEY, 1973, AND SOCIAL SECURITY RECORDS: EXACT MATCH DATA (ICPSR 7616). Items provide demographic information, such as total earnings, date of birth, sex, and race, on 90,174 persons aged 14 and older in the United States in
the period 1937-1975. Additional items specify claim types, such as health insurance benefits, and disability status. See also the related collection, CURRENT POPULATION SURVEY: ANNUAL DEMOGRAPHIC FILE, 1973 (ICPSR 7564).

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR IV.C. Economic Behavior and Attitudes, Historical and Contemporary Economic Processes and Indicators

fields.value: Version Date: 2008-10-09Version Text: 2008-10-09Version Date: 2008-10-09Version Text: 2008-10-09 Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: SAS, SPSS, and Stata setup files have been added to this data collection.;Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: (1) All records contain weights, which must be used in any analysis. (2) The codebook is provided by ICPSR as a Portable Document Format (PDF) file. The PDF file format was developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated and can be accessed using PDF reader software, such as the Adobe Acrobat Reader. Information on how to obtain a copy of the Acrobat Reader is provided on the ICPSR Web site.; Subject: null  Type: null  Notes: Data file(s), and electronic documentation.;

value: United States Internal Revenue Service (IRS) and Social Security Administration (SSA) records

fields.value: A total of 90,174 persons aged 14 and older for whom earnings extracts were included in the CURRENT POPULATION SURVEY, 1973, AND SOCIAL SECURITY RECORDS: EXACT MATCH DATA (ICPSR 7616), in the period 1937-1975.
